entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers/VPS] - Rescue mode
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 19, 09:00 - 10:45 UTC

Dec 15, 18:03 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/12/2022 09:00 UTC 
End time : 19/12/2022 10:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to remove options 'rescue64-pro' and 'rescue64-ovh' and replace them by 'rescue-customer' in 'Boot rescue mode' for dedicated and virtual private servers.
To use rescue mode, you can refer to the current link: https://docs.ovh.com/fr/dedicated/ovh-rescue/#en-pratique

entry.title: [GRA3][CoolingSystem] - Rack GRA0326A05B
entry.content:
Dec 17, 07:10 UTC
Completed - Start Time : 16/12/2022 23:00 UTC
End Time : 17/12/2022 06:12 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 16, 22:53 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 16, 22:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/12/2022 23:00 UTC
Estimate max end time : 17/12/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Due to a failure detection on the cooling system, our team must urgently perform a curative maintenance on the rack. Some servers must be interrupted during the operation. Our teams will check each server 1 by 1. We apologize for the inconvenience caused

entry.title: [RBX][DedicatedServers] - Rack 12D01
entry.content:

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Investigating - Start time : 16/12/2022 22:00 UTC
